subject: Re: Re: Brake load cell problem
description_text:
Hello!

Unfortunately, after almost a year, i am having load cell problems in my
brake pedal once again.

I am attaching video of the problem. I do the calibration and then press
the brake on 100%. It is visible that the signal is glitching up and down.
Is it possible to solve this problem?

Thank you for you help and best regards!

Jernej Primožič

>

conversations.body_text: Hi Jernej Primožič,  Could you please provide your order number so we can check it for you? Also, the video you uploaded seems incomplete and I’m unable to open it. Please upload it to Google Drive, send us the share link, and set the permission to “Anyone with the link can view.” If it’s confirmed that the brake pressure sensor is defective, you can also purchase a replacement brake pressure sensor separately to fix the issue.
